issue.title: [Python][Packaging] Windows py38 wheels are built with wrong ABI tag
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7766](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7766). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
File paths have `cp38m` in them, which confuses pip.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7766?focusedCommentId=17030262) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
Issue resolved by pull request 6353
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6353>
